conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a high-fidelity isometric cutaway model that accurately translates the 2D architectural geometry into 3D.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D extrusion and perspective. Wall thickness and corner geometry are consistent throughout.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent room configuration and wall alignment. Minor point deduction for the stairs' orientation being slightly abstracted compared to the plan's arrow.

interior_elements.notes: All furniture, kitchen fixtures, and bathroom elements are present and correctly scaled. Furniture placement is highly accurate.

visual_clarity.notes: High structural clarity and lighting. Score reduced due to the inclusion of text labels ('Bedroom', 'Kitchen/Living') over the 3D geometry which impacts presentation hygiene.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan were projected onto or kept in the 3D render space.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D transformation that preserves the exact layout, wall geometry, and furniture placement of the original architectural drawing.
